=`DROP TABLE`=

{{{
DROP TABLE <table_name>;
}}}


Remove all rows from the table and remove the table from sys.tables. No mapreduce overhead, all tuples are deleted in parallel across the cluster.

===Examples===

{{{
DROP TABLE archive_data;
}}}
